/** * Updates the active {@link org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster.JobMaster Job Manager} * in case of change. * *

This is useful in settings where high-availability is enabled and * a failed Job Manager is replaced by a new one. * *

IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than * the {@link #getKvStateLocationOracle(JobID)}. * * @param jobId identifying the job for which to update the key-value state location oracle * @param kvStateLocationOracle the key-value state location oracle for the given {@link JobID}, * or null if there is no oracle anymore */
code:
/** * Updates the active {@link org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmaster.JobMaster Job Manager} * in case of change. * *

This is useful in settings where high-availability is enabled and * a failed Job Manager is replaced by a new one. * *

IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than * the {@link #getKvStateLocationOracle(JobID)}. * * @param jobId identifying the job for which to update the key-value state location oracle * @param kvStateLocationOracle the key-value state location oracle for the given {@link JobID}, * or null if there is no oracle anymore */ void updateKvStateLocationOracle(JobID jobId, @Nullable KvStateLocationOracle kvStateLocationOracle).

comment:
/** * Retrieves a future containing the currently leading key-value state location oracle. * *

IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than the * {@link #updateKvStateLocationOracle(JobID, KvStateLocationOracle)}. * * @param jobId identifying the job for which to request the key-value state location oracle * @return The key-value state location oracle for the given {@link JobID} or null if none. */
code:
/** * Retrieves a future containing the currently leading key-value state location oracle. * *

IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than the * {@link #updateKvStateLocationOracle(JobID, KvStateLocationOracle)}. * * @param jobId identifying the job for which to request the key-value state location oracle * @return The key-value state location oracle for the given {@link JobID} or null if none. */ @Nullable KvStateLocationOracle getKvStateLocationOracle(JobID jobId).
